Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: If you would like to contact me about my photography or anything else, fill out the form below and I will follow up with you shortly. You can also reach me on Instagram, LinkedIn, or Facebook from the links in the About section of this site.

Engineering.title: Web Development
Engineering.intro: This page is to describe my work as a software engineer and provide my resume
Engineering.overview: I graduated from Georgia Institute of Technology in 2021 with a bachelors degree in Computer Science. After that I began working fulltime at Publicis Sapient, which is a digital consultation firm that primarily focuses on building out client's online presences. I enjoy front end development and learning the various technologies that go into it.
